string.name: addreport_content
string.font: \nTry to include more specific descriptions as much as possible (brand, color, etc)

string.name: addreport_location
string.font: \nIf item is lost, include the last location the item was still in possession, if recalled.\nElse if item is found, include the location the item was found.

string.name: addreport_other
string.font: \nInclude here your other additional messages. (contact info, incentive, etc)
